• Minimum Qualifications1 or more years of industry experience building scalable micro services or data driven platforms.
• Computer science fundamentals and data engineering fundamentalsPrior experience with Java/Scala/C++ or equivalent.
• Experience with NoSQL datastores ( e.
• G Cassandra, Keyspaces, ElastiCache) and data modelingExperience with data processing technologies (e.
• G Kafka, Spark, Flink )Experience building and scaling systems in the cloudFamiliarity with cloud paradigms ( e.
• G AWS )Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent is required.
• Master's degree preferred.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• The ideal candidate will have experience in Microchip firmware (MPLAB, Harmony), embedded Linux (ARM SoCs, Quartus), C++ GUI development with Qt, and networking (TCP/UDP).
• You'll translate customer needs into technical solutions and support project development end-to-end.
• Security clearance eligibility required (DoD preferred).
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
